abstracts.cdata!:
Construction of the three 200 MW
            generating units at the Korba thermal power station, in the
            State of Madhya Pradesh, together with ancillary equipment
            and related works, and about 880 circuit km of associated
            transmission lines. The risks involved are no greater than
            can normally be expected with operations of this type.
